title: This could be one of the all time greatest failures
review: There is no possible way that anyone could seriously rate this movie even close to the scores on this site. This movie is the first movie I have walked out of in 10 years. I am a huge fan of this genre and this to me was the ultimate disappointment. I actually cringed at a lot of the 'horror scenes', very very lame.At 45 minutes in I had to check my ticket to see how much longer I would have to endure the pain. After realising how much longer I had to go, a swift exit took place. I hope you read this review before wasting your time and money.
